fields.name: Desalination
fields.blurb: Our expertise in the field of desaliantion includes: Design of membrane based systems (reverse osmosis, ultrafiltration and microfiltration), research on membrane fouling and scaling and pre-treatment. We are also expert with various methods used in water quality monitoring such as MFI-UF, TEP, BGP, DOC/TOC, FEEM, LCOCD etc

fields.name: Front-End-Development
fields.blurb: Our expertise in web site development using all languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, python.

fields.name: Water and Sanitation (WASH)
fields.blurb: Our expertise includes design of low cost rural and urban WASH systems

fields.name: Backend Development
fields.blurb: Our expertise include the backend development of website using Javascript, python, Django

fields.name: Water Treatment
fields.blurb: We specialized on research, design and monitoring of surface water, groundwater treatment with more than 10 years of professional exprience

fields.name: Proposal writing
fields.blurb: We specialized on writing winning research proposal in the field of WASH, water treatment(conventional and membrane based)

fields.name: Water quality monitoring
fields.blurb: We specialized on differnt methods for water quality monitoring in surface, ground and seawater

fields.name: Advisory services
fields.blurb: We specialized on providing and advise to the issues related to the operation of surface, ground, seawater treatment plant using conventional and membrane based technologies.
